title: CLEAR_NITROUS
content:
0xC889AE921400E1ED// ClearNitrous
void CLEAR_NITROUS(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle whose nitrous system needs to be cleared.NativeDB Introduced: 3095Resets or clears the nitrous system for a specified vehicle. You can check if a vehicle has nitrous with IS_NITROUS_ACTIVEExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if vehicle == 0 then return end

-- Check if nitrous is active on the vehicle.
if IsNitrousActive(vehicle) then
    -- If nitrous is active, clear the nitrous boost from the vehicle.
    ClearNitrous(vehicle)
end
codeBlocks:
-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if vehicle == 0 then return end

-- Check if nitrous is active on the vehicle.
if IsNitrousActive(vehicle) then
    -- If nitrous is active, clear the nitrous boost from the vehicle.
    ClearNitrous(vehicle)
end
